name: time-machine
title: Time Machine
description: This extension is built to integrate MacOS system backup utility "TimeMachine" with Raycast. With the help of tmutil CLI Utility, it offers users the ability to control their backups with ease.
author: SuoweiHu

commands.name: cmd-start-backup
commands.title: Start Backup
commands.description: Perform a standard backup. This is equivalent to choosing "Back Up Now" from the Time Machine menu extra.

commands.name: cmd-stop-backup
commands.title: Stop Backup
commands.description: Cancel a backup currently in progress.

commands.name: cmd-list-destination
commands.title: List Backup
commands.description: Print information about destinations currently configured for use with Time Machine.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
